title: kaalai thookki ninDru
sahitya:
kAlai tUkki ninru Adum deivamE ennai kai tUkkiyAL deivamE

(kAlai)



anupallavi



vElai tUkkum piLLai tanai petra deivamE minnum pugazhshEr

tillai ponnambalattil oru 

(kAlai)



caraNam



shengaiyil mAn tUkki shivanda mazhuvai tUkki angattil oru peNNai

anudinamum tUkki

gangaiyai tingaLai kaditta shaDaimEl tUkki ingum angumAi tEDi

iruvar kaNDariyAda 

(kAlai)
